EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Platform Roadshow - CenturyLink_Q215.Toronto - Week Before In
EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday at the Cloud Platform Seminar - Toronto
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Platform Seminar coming up next Thursday in Toronto. We look forward to seeing you!
Please also bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Cloud Platform Seminar Thursday, October 8, 2015 8:30am - 4:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda
Pivotal Toronto One Toronto Street 11th Floor Toronto, ON M5C 2V6 Map & Directions <https://www.google.com/maps/place/1+Toronto+St,+Toronto,+ON+M5C,+Canada/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x89d4cb323c288245:0xf7d2714006446721?sa=X&ved=0CB0Q8gEwAGoVChMIlZ3LnJmdyAIVCzWICh0t5Qva>
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git (http://git-scm.com/downloads <http://git-scm.com/downloads>) ("brew install git") - The Cloud Foundry CLI (https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases>) - download the latest! - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans)
QUESTIONS? Contact Kim Marie Ruquet at kruquet@pivotal.io <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or via cell at 631-388-0569 <tel:631-388-0569>.
We look forward to seeing you next week. The Pivotal & CenturyLink team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-platform-seminar/toronto>.
